channel.title: Forensics on Gabriele Abbate
channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on Gabriele Abbate

item.title: eval_me
item.description: I was trying a beginner CTF challenge and successfully solved it. But it didn’t give me the flag. Luckily I have this network capture. Can you investigate? Attachment: capture.pcapng nc chals.sekai.team 9000 Connecting to the server via nc we get this: Welcome to this intro pwntools challenge. I will send you calculations and you will send me the answer Do it 100 times within time limit and you get the flag :) 3 + 7 >>> After noticing that the script require very fast answers I wrote this simple script to automatize the answers:

item.title: whistle_blower
item.description: While going through some books, Alice found the identity of the whistleblower in their company and was utterly suprised by the name. She needed to inform Eve about it but she didn’t know who is watching her emails. So she decided to hide the message in her email to Eve. See if you can figure out who betrayed the company. Download: Dear_Eve.txt Content of the file: Dear Eve, Thank you for your email informing me of your absence.
